body:
For some reason I always get kicked out for flying when I am just really laggy and it seems like I'm flying which I'm not. I don't know why the game thinks I'm flying because I don't even know how to hack. Please unban me. My ign is Elian_Garcia

(He couldn't make fourms account since hes banned and can't get online)

title: Ban appeal for Elian_Garcia

replies.body: umm, dude, no mod can ban you for fly hacking without seeing you.. you must have been fly hacking... its hard to mistake a fly hack, we probably have proof as well...
replies.body_tagged: umm, dude, no mod can ban you for fly hacking without seeing you.. you must have been fly hacking... its hard to mistake a fly hack, we probably have proof as well...

replies.body: If you wish to appeal a punishment that you believe you do not deserve and/or that was invalid, you can email support@avicus.net with the guidelines posted in the Admin Blog. Do not post appeals on our forum.
